name: Quad Wars
description:
Soulful Games Presents...

Quad Wars For Android

A Quadcopter game with a difference. Shoot up buildings and other quads or race against the clock in four different environments: forest enclave, ice base, snow wilderness or urban district. 

Switch between 2D and 3D views at key strategic moments to either destroy your enemies or win a time-trial race and collect health and ammo packs to enhance your life expectancy against some of the most lethal quads you will ever face.

Android Requirements

Screen Sizes             -    5 Inch and above
Operating Systems  -    Android 6.0 and above

The developer recommends using a bluetooth gamepad for more accurate control due to the flying nature of the game.

Soulful Games make good quality, affordable products which do not contain advertisements or additional paid content and are designed with all ages in mind. If you are concerned about privacy please see our privacy policy at http://www.soulfulgames.com.
